name: Eternal Conglomerate Empire
description:
Try to prevent the bloated industrial corporation-state you've inherited from collapsing in the midst of workers' uprisings, war, and other surprises. Or don't! There are a bunch of different endings. If you're playing this on a computer, you can enter fullscreen mode by clicking the button in the lower right corner.

Game, music, and art by Alex Huang (@LydianChord)

Soundtrack: link
